About Us

K.J. Somaiya Polytechnic is situated in Mumbai

in Maharashtra state of India. Established in 1963.

Additional campus facilities such as Boys Hostel,

Canteen, Computer Lab, Fest, Girls Hostel, Guest

house, Mess, Theatre, Library, Medical Facilities

are also there.
